target: Just let us know when you are ready to book and we will be happy to assist you. Have a great day!
context: <user>  Are there any guesthouses with 3 star ratings? <system>  I was able to get four results for what you are looking for, is there a certain price range you would like? <user>  Yes definitely. I would like something moderate. <system>  We have four guesthouses that fit the bill, two in the north, one in the south, and one in the west. <user>  Out of those, can you find me one with free internet and parking? <system>  We have 3 that match your criteria but Hamilton Lodge is very popular. Would you like to try there? <user>  No, I'm not ready to book just yet. Thank you! <system>
